channel.title: Writing on Unofficial Grex User Guide

item.title: A New Blog post
item.description: Introduction I do not know if adding a text file with date would just place it right Some Definitions There are a few concepts that you need to understand before creating a theme. Don’t Repeat Yourself DRY is a good design goal and Hugo does a great job supporting it. Part of the art of a good template is knowing when to add a new template and when to update an existing one.
